title: A Mouse Called Miika
description: From the world of A Boy Called Christmas, now a major motion picture, comes the epic adventure of a tiny heroThis is a tale of mice and magic.It is also a tale of great love (of cheese) and great danger. And of learning the lesson that what matters most--when it comes to cheese and life--is not how strongly you smell but how strong you are on the inside.
author: Matt Haig
